website_summaries.verdict: A basic travel bottle to keep your toiletry liquids safe while moving around at the airport. Good choice to keep a number of different liquids protected.
pros: Can safely contain water, oil, soaps, and lotions within the TSA travel limits for liquids
BPA-free design to keep out harmful chemicals when carrying drinkable liquids
cons: Can be difficult to squeeze with thick liquids

customer_reviews.title: These are BY FAR the best travel bottles on Amazon, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: These bottle are INCREDIBLE. I had been searching for MONTHS to find small, quality travel bottles. I had no idea how difficult it would be to find something durable with GOOD SNAPPING LIDS was. .There are soooo many gimmicky bottles for travel, but these are no nonsense. Having these HDPE is a huge deal, and I can fill these with practically anything without worrying. Also these are made in the USA. It's always good to buy American when available. And at this price it is a huge value. Don't hesitate- these are BY FAR the best travel bottles on Amazon, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: ifizzy142

customer_reviews.title: Spill proof as promised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bottles to take on a plane. As soon as I got them, I filled them with water and put them each into a cup to see if there were any leaks. I left them in these cups (and agitated them a few times) for 24 hours. None of them leaked. The cap on my yellow one is a bit off kilter, but it didn't leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 2oz bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, effective spill proof bottles - I use them to sample my homemade leave-in/detangler. Works well and serves their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Bottles lids do tend to loosen and leak, as other reviews said, place a small piece of saran wrap under top before closing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: High quality plastic, comfortably squeezable, secure lids to prevent leaks. Perfect for TSA compliance re carry-on bag. Timely delivery. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: silverlady

customer_reviews.title: Bottles came promptly and in excellent condition. Such better quality and sooo much better ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for travel!!!! Bottles came promptly and in excellent condition. Such better quality and sooo much better from a health perspective than anything that I have seen elsewhere!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorsey Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Travel bottles are perfect and look to be really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & has made life I a little easier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size & has made life I a little easier. It's sturdy, so far no leaks & can be used for several things. I mostly used it to make my own hair conditioner but you can use it for travel. I'm pretty sure you'll come up with ideas. I'm very satisfied with this product & definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Good travel partner
customer_reviews.text: They close tightly and so far have not spilled anything in my suitcase. I travel overseas a lot. So far they have survived two overseas trips - 16+ hrs of flight time and 6 hotel stays. I love traveling with my own body wash and shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel containers
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Have already started using them; added organic hand sanitizer. Dispenses perfectly and fits really well in my purse. Perfect size for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: nice bottles
customer_reviews.text: These look perfect for traveling. I got them for my wife and she was very happy with the quality abd size of them. We havent used them yet so the true test will be how they hold up in the flight.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D himself

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These "flip-type" caps stay on better than the ones that you press to open.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Aragon

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a bottle that does not leak!
customer_reviews.text: As a flight attendant I needed a bottle that does not leak with the air pressure of the plane going up and down. I've always had that problem and my shampoo would always leak inside my luggage, no matter how much I had left in the bottle. Now, these, because they are hard it does not get depressurized and leak all over. It's not hard to squeeze at all, as some people have said here. Very happy with these travel bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Tuddor

customer_reviews.title: Field tested over a year
customer_reviews.text: So I will preface this by my own personal experience. Used this on the daily for very thin(low viscosity) hair shampoo and not once has this leaked. It's gone carry on on flights, been dropped on hard tile from my collapsing shower caddy, been left in Texas summer heat in my car... All in all, it's been fine. Material is soft but still has form. Nice snap with best balance of secure fit to one handed ease. Opens in shower with one hand without any issues. Great gift. These are tall slim and slightly frosted but still transparent.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottles
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are great. I bought these specifically because I wanted to transfer my hand sanitizer from the PocketBac that Bath & Body Works uses because those suck. I like these because they're small enough to carry in your pocket, have a nice click cap to keep it clean and neat and the clear squeezable body is also what drew me to purchase. And they do not disappoint. Will more than likely buy again. Recommend this item without a doubt. And shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This held up great on an international trip for a couple weeks with ...
customer_reviews.text: This held up great on an international trip for a couple weeks with multiple flights and over-stuffed luggage that without a doubt brought crushing forces on these little bottles on more than one occasion. No leaks ever though. They also rinse easy and don't leave trace smells of former contents. AT&T told me that my phone was unlocked a week before my trip but they lied and it was still locked when I got there. These 2 oz. travel bottles left my BO low and my skin moisturized, not high and dry like AT&T did. 5/5 stars low & wet travel bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these plastic squeeze bottles for my window cleaning technicians; to be used as handy soap applicators while they work. Easy to fill as they have a wide mouth. Durable as we open and close the snap locking cap. Perfect hole diameter size. Clear enough to see how much liquid is in the bottle. I couldn’t be happier! I’ve tried many brands and these really are the very best!
customer_reviews.author: Iloveyour window homes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Oops! Left negative review for wrong product ... my bad! These bottles have a good thickness to them and the caps seem sturdy. They aren't terribly "squeezable" so I will probably use these for thinner, more liquidy products like face wash, body wash, toner, etc. Not sure how well they'll work for thicker products like creams or lotions but I'm willing to give it a try. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: clmck1620

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best travel bottles I’ve ever bought. I’ve had them for about a month and have done a few trips thusfar. This is what I noticed: 1.They are sturdy 2.They haven’t leaked yet 3.The oil based products don’t get stuck like they do with the silicon based bottles. 4. A little hard to squeeze so the stuff inside comes out slow. I like it since it conservatives the product
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Ipek

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Bottles seem to be good quality, a good travel size, or good for general at-home use for some products so I don't have to take up storage space with larger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: pegasus

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I regularly travel for work, and have used several different styles of travel bottles. I’ve been using these bottles for 10 months (shampoo, conditioner, body wash, sunscreen). The cap stays closed with no leaks during travel. And the bottle squeeze/flexibility is very nice. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rflu

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with Class in Coach
customer_reviews.text: I used these bottles to store homemade bug repellent for our Missions Trip to the Dominican Republic. We wanted to make sure it arrived with us, so we placed it in our carry-on luggage. There were no accidents (leakage) or incidents (the right size to meet FDA and security standards). I like the convenience of a flip top over a conventional twist on lid. We plan to use these bottles again.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Have filled but haven't used yet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to pack in my suitcase for my trip to Hawaii next week. I wanted a couple of smaller bottles for mouthwash, and body soap. We don't use a whole lot of these two and wanted something smaller to pack vs packing those big bottles. So far they seem perfect to hold the few items I needed them for. We will see have I get back if they worked well. So far I will give them a five star.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boldt

customer_reviews.title: Only reusable twice
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s bpa free, no leakage but it still seems like lower quality(the caps aren’t promising)
customer_reviews.author: Natayla

customer_reviews.title: Great travel-size bottles!
customer_reviews.text: These bottles fit perfectly in my Baggallini luggage hanging cosmetic bag, four to one compartment. They are a perfect size for shampoo, conditioner, lotion, etc., for traveling, they are well-priced and they don't leak! I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Yes they're a bit stiff
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are a bit stiff as others have said but they can be squeezed enough to get even a fairly thick substance out. Waiting to see how airtight they are. I moved some fluid acrylic paint from a very open pot to these in hopes the paint wouldn't dry out so much.
customer_reviews.author: psyche 1954

customer_reviews.title: My favorites
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy products. The bottom is flat which really makes filling them quite easy. I also love that they're not exactly clear they are white which makes the colors of the products still show through but it doesn't completely make everything look the same. You can definitely distinguish shampoo and soap from conditioner etc. I make my own lotions and soaps so the muted pastels are really appealing to customers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jo Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: These are not leakproof, especially for thinner liquids. I had a couple messes all over my toiletry bag before I finally gave up. For thick liquids they work ok.
customer_reviews.author: T H Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fill, travel well, don't leak
customer_reviews.text: The openings are a little small, making it hard to fill with shampoo. But the filled bottles traveled well between Jackson Hole and Belize (they didn't leak).
customer_reviews.author: Tall Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great containers for hand sanitizer. Will buy these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: Travel Ease
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these travel size containers for my next trip so they have been used yet. Arrival was prompt & product matches the description. I will share more once in use but am happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good but hard to squeeze
customer_reviews.text: The bottles seem to be good and true to size as advertised. The only reason I gave 4 stars was because they are a little hard to squeeze compared to other bottles. I think of customers who have arthritis or other conditions that would make it difficult for them to squeeze the product out of the bottles. Otherwise, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits in one quart bag and doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked as expected. I was able to easily fit four liquid based toiletry products in a single quart sized bag. The containers didn't leak and held more than enough for a few weeks of shampoo and body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S Goforth

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect, I was even able to write on them ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use on a cruise so I didn't have to pack full size bottles. They were perfect, I was even able to write on them what was inside.
customer_reviews.author: TKESlinky

customer_reviews.title: I use these bottles to keep manageable amounts of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these bottles to keep manageable amounts of my shampoo and conditioner in the shower. They seem to work well and are cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: M. Petro

customer_reviews.title: These Are Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly as described. Very rugged. No leaks. Gets you on the airplane and does not damage your surrounding packing by leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S. Kersey

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bottles. Slim profile helps with packing light. These are also strong enough to hold liquids, gels and lotions. Would recommend. Product arrived quickly and well packed
customer_reviews.author: Snowdon

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are advertised as 2oz, but they are closer to 3oz. Still good for airline travel, but I already have 3oz and wanted smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Slim Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. If you plan to use these for messy liquids during a flight, you may want to tape them up as well. The caps can come a little unscrewed. The tops flip/snap on tightly though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great containers
customer_reviews.text: Great containers although they're slightly "stiffer" than I thought they would be. They fit nicely in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for travel
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bottles for travel. Caps seem secure when closed but I would but them in a zip-loc bag to be sure. Fairly flexible plastic bottles, easy to squeeze out the contents
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and Caps Seal Well
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy bottles, not the ultra thin-walled ones you find in some discount stores. The caps seal well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: These satisfy my OCD.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me as a dude...I use it for travel and use cleanser, moisturizer, body wash, mouthwash. They look so good when I line them up at the hotel. They make me feel like I have arrived.
customer_reviews.author: wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: I think these would be fine for travel. I use them on a daily basis, and I worry the lid hinge may not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Random Pseudonym

customer_reviews.title: Great travel containers.
customer_reviews.text: Travel sized containers, what more to say? They are well made and do not leak.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for liquid items in overnight travel bag......on leaks!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are really hard to squeeze, it's really hard plastic.

customer_reviews.title: plastic bottles perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: they are TSA approved and that's what I needed... also the caps seem to fit tightly enough that there will be no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: DiBoo

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, no leaks, no problem squeezing!
customer_reviews.text: These travel size containers were perfect. The caps didn't leak and felt secure around the container. I'm seeing some complaints about the bottles being hard to squeeze, but I had no difficulty (really, like zero) squeezing these bottles to get conditioner/shampoo/sunscreen out. Highly recommended for traveling!

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, don't know if they leak yet
customer_reviews.text: perfect size, don't know if they leak yet, haven't used. bought for saline solution to carry in purse for contacts
customer_reviews.author: Michele by the sea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bottles
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are amazing perfect size for my purse to hold my hand sanitizer, and lotion. They DON'T LEAK! I love them.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone and do business again
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised and delivered very quickly. Would recommend to anyone and do business again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are just the right size. The price was right and I got them right away. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: they do their job but no sign on the bottles stating bra free

customer_reviews.title: ... for making at home all-natural sunscreen and they were perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these containers for making at home all-natural sunscreen and they were perfect!!!! Love the easy squeeze tops. And love that they are BPA free!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, and it shipped quickly and securely.

customer_reviews.text: So far the bottles are great, I haven't used them for their intended purposes yet but I can tell they are quality plastic and shouldn't leak.

customer_reviews.title: These bottles are the perfect size. Love them
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are the perfect size. Love them. Customer service is one of the Best I've seen in a long time. Yes, I do recommend them. Such a great place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, effective, have lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: Update: still using after several months, two months of which were in Europe where I had only these for toiletries. Great durability, no problem getting gels out when they’re low. Thoroughly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Vuhraddin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to squeeze & see what you put in
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to squeeze & see what you put in there
customer_reviews.author: kyle williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to make a cute "travel basket" gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Wordweaver

customer_reviews.title: Working well.
customer_reviews.text: They work well. No leaks on both ends of my roundtrip flight from East to West Coast.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy material, shipped quickly, product as described. will do business again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill. Lid fits tightly don't have to worry about leaking will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I think this product is excellent. I am very pleased with the way the ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is excellent. I am very pleased with the way the tops are so secure - both the part that snaps and the part the screws on. And I like that they are clear so I can see what is in them.
customer_reviews.author: Shalene Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottles arrived quickly and work well for homemade hand sanitizer, no leaking
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Most worked but several were defective (leaked) from improper packing/production.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, these were OK bottles for what we needed. Our intent was to put waterless cleaner in them for emergency kits. The majority were pretty good but we had several that were 'crunched' on the top and leaked when liquid was put in them. There were still enough for what we needed but the QA for these was lacking and we had defective products. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Whitmer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase of an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order as these are great for essential oil recipes! I've used them for hand sanitizer and other liquids and expect to order more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price...they fit perfectly in the travel bag I already had for my makeup and bathroom "stuff"!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: I expected the plastic bottles to be more pliable. ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected the plastic bottles to be more pliable. I'm using them for lotion samples and it's not the easiest bottle to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Walker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sometimes the cap is a little hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noted as Squeezable but they are not. You can ...
customer_reviews.text: Noted as Squeezable but they are not. You can squeeze them only a tiny bit but the bottles are fairly firm and are not made of soft squeezable material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with them
customer_reviews.text: These little bottles traveled halfway around the world and back! Extremely happy with them! No leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kurovski

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: First use they leaked. Luckily I had them in a zip loc bag.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Leak Proof
customer_reviews.text: Filled with liquid and tilted upside down in various positions for 5 different days to test leakage. Completely leak-proof. Plastic is firm, non-squeezable. If you need to take a liquid that needs to be squeezed out, this is not the container you want to buy. This is to fill with liquids that you intend to tip over i.e. face toner, body oil, rubbing alcohol etc.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Saver

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles for liquids!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the build and quality of these travel bottles. I use them for Dr. Bronner's liquid soap, and they're perfect. The hole at the top is fairly narrow, so great for liquids, but maybe not so good for something more viscous like a thick cream lotion or shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: cs24601

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for to go salad dressing/condiment bottles and not overpriced like so many of the "leak-proof" products I looked through. These do not leak. They are sturdy little bottles that will not crush easily and are easy to wash. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them to travel with, for two months now. They are great. My shampoo Baking powder Hydrogen peroxide Coconut oil... when it gets hot, the oil seeps out. It gets all lubricated! I think these little bottles are great, I think one can get very creative with them. They came quickly, they came well packaged
customer_reviews.author: MIKO

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - hard to squeeze
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that these bottles are a lot less squeezable than the description would have you believe - they are very firm bottles. I use them for toiletries/cleansers etc and while they may be very robust, that goes against them being pliable and easy to squeeze. They are not. I haven't had any issues with the lids or them sealing well, while travelling, but I keep them in a zip lock plastic bag, just to be sure. They are adequate but not what I expected, and are difficult to use especially to get the last of the lotion or whatever out of the bottle. I probably wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Love2ShopTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: THE PRICE IS RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I am more than happy to give this product a 5 Stars because the bottles are great, and the bottles are made of strong hard plastic. They don't leak like other bottles I've seen before. They arrived on the same day just as the seller said they would, they were in good condition just the right size I wanted. I also want to inform my friends out there that the bottles are TSA approved we can carry them on board of the air craft.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. I have filled them with ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I have filled them with conditioner and they work as expected to dispense' it when I take a shower at the gym. Let me add that the cost saving should be obvious when comparing the cost of using these refillable bottles compared to buying travel size shampoo and conditioner. Sure, the travel size bottles are refillable too, but I couldn't find my brand in that size. These are great since they hold a little bit more than the average travel size bottle
customer_reviews.author: F. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: After four years, still no leaks and they still look almost new
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a trip four years ago, and after years of monthly travel and frequent use, and misuse, none have ever leaked and the lids still show no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: HgTstr

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good
customer_reviews.text: So far seems great. I bought it for hand sanitizer. I haven't used it too much yet but it seems to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Lari

customer_reviews.title: They are usable, but not what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to transfer shampoo from a large container into these smaller bottles and based on reviews which stated wide openings, purchased these. Unfortunately, while transferring the shampoo, it dripped all over the sink, even though I was using a funnel.
customer_reviews.author: asiana

customer_reviews.title: I love that this is better quality plastic and that was ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is better quality plastic and that was the driving force behind this purchase. However, I found that it’s noy the easiest to squeeze out the lotion I put in if it’s near the 1/5 of the bottle. I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: the 4th dropped from a low height and the cap broke rendering it fairly useful. The others have suffered far worse drops without
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 4 work very well, the 4th dropped from a low height and the cap broke rendering it fairly useful. The others have suffered far worse drops without any negative repercussions however, so it might just be an unlucky fluke.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to hold enough while being a great size and shape for packing. Tucks very easily into a smaller bag or pocket. Not the cheap stiff kind of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieO

customer_reviews.title: Very good size for skincare products (toner
customer_reviews.text: Very good size for skincare products (toner, cleanser) for traveilng. Good for shampoo/conditioner if travelling on a weekend getaway, but not enough for more than a few days of travel.
customer_reviews.author: Dr RH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, they do not leak
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, they do not leak. And they are durable, but are soft plastic so that you are actually able to squeeze out product, unlike some others that are very rigid. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Flip top bottles are great.
customer_reviews.text: Flip top plastic jars are great for using with one hand while your other hand is applying essential oils to the clients body. Flip open, squirt, flip shut.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carryons.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Used them for a 3-week European trip. No leaking whatsoever.

customer_reviews.title: They work perfectly and its a good size. For a family of 5 everyone was ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used these on our last trip. They work perfectly and its a good size. For a family of 5 everyone was able to have their own mouthwash, shampoo etc. Bottles did not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked these items. I would reorder them. Right size for my packing for shampoos and food liquids also.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size, but a little overpriced for what it is.

customer_reviews.text: I am using these for travel and I had to stay under the 3 ounce limit imposed by the government.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The yellow bottle leaks during air travel. The quality of the lids are lacking.

customer_reviews.title: They work GREAT, No issues with carry on

product_meta.title: MoYo Natural Labs 2 oz Travel Bottles, TSA Approved Empty Travel Containers with Flip Caps, BPA Free HDPE Plastic Squeezable Toiletry/Cosmetic Bottles (6 pack, Multi Color)
product_meta.description:
Size:Pack of 6| Color:Multi Color Cap

5 out of 5-star rating for MoYo Natural Labs airline bottles, HDPE plastic small empty containers, TSA approved travel size bottle, BPA free 2 ounce bottles and made in the USA leak-proof travel size bottle set.

MoYo Natural Labs HDPE bottles are built to be re-used often, resisting rot and other chemicals. HDPE creates no harmful emissions during its production or during use

2 ounce bottle (59 ml) is squeezable, refillable, leakproof bottles are TSA Approved with a secure flip cap that has also been approved for carrying on.

Made of HDPE #2 plastic that's designed to last, our travel bottles are perfect for all of your liquid toiletries, essential oil and beauty cosmetics. 

The benefits of HDPE Plastic 2 ounce bottles: 

- HDPE travel sized bottles meet the TSA guidelines for carry on empty travel bottles. 

- Feel safe and secure with reusing your travel bottle over a long period of time. 

- Large neck making it easy to fill the bottle. 

- Leak Proof design prevents wasting any of your valuable toiletries. 

- Perfect for all of your toiletry or food or liquid items that you wish to carry on the plane. 

- OUR PROMISE! If these lotion bottles from MoYo Natural Labs become compromised or leak in the first year, we'll replace your airplane trip approved small containers, even if it is your fault. We're that confident that you'll love your new EMPTY BOTTLE and will continue to use MoYo Natural Labs HDPE TRAVEL BOTTLE in the future. 

CLICK the "Add to Cart" button to order the MoYo Natural Labs HDPE 2 oz Travel Bottle Set and TRAVEL SIZE BOTTLES! Perfect for Air freshener/Acetone/Rubbing Alcohol/Oils/Paint/Alcohol ink/Windex/Bleach/Cleaning Solutions/Insect repellent/Toner/Makeup/Fragrances
feature_bullets: 2 OZ HDPE SMALL BOTTLES MEDICAL GRADE airline bottles BPA free TSA approved travel Bottles Guaranteed Leak Proof Bottles. Travel size high quality HDPE bottles are built to be re-used often, resisting rot and other chemicals. HDPE creates no harmful emissions during its production or during use
TSA APPROVED SPILL PROOF HDPE PLASTIC BOTTLE SAVES YOU MONEY AND HASSLE. Durable Food Safe Premium HDPE plastic is ideal for Oils, Toners, Water.
UV PROTECTED FOOD SAFE HDPE 2 OZ PLASTIC BOTTLE. Non-Toxic 2 oz Travel Bottles.
MADE IN THE USA TSA approved Mini Bottles 2 oz and HDPE Travel Bottle Kit to carry-on the plane.
OUR NO LEAK 2 OZ TRAVEL BOTTLES PROMISE if you have any issues with our travel size small plastic containers, just let us know
